name: the House gazes also
description:
the House gazes also is a branching choice-based visual short story game created using Twine, an open-source game development software. It explores the personification of our digital selves, imagining a virtual otherworld that is starting to blend with our own reality, where these digital activities have a semblance of consciousness and control over our organic lives.

Created as part of ongoing thesis research for the creator's Masters in Graphic Design. University of Illinois at Chicago, 2020
